required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Ocular Tolerance, Safety and Ocular Pharmacokinetics After 1 Drop of T1225 0.5, 1.0, 1.5% in 48 Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of the Ocular Tolerance, the Safety and the Ocular Pharmacokinetics After One Drop of Three Different Concentrations of T1225 (0.5% - 1.0% - 1.5%) in 48 Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: To compare the ocular tolerance, the safety and the ocular pharmacokinetics of 3 concentrations (0.5% - 1.0% - 1.5%) and the vehicle of T1225 after one drop instillation

detailed_description.textblock: The aim of the present study was to compare the ocular tolerance, safety and the ocular pharmacokinetics after a single administration of T1225 eye drops (0.5%, 1.0%, or 1.5%) in healthy volunteers.
